fields.ems_management_contractor: Midwest Emergency Department Services (meds) - O'Fallon, IL
fields.capital_expenditure_1: Pentax Eus Arietta 850 Digital Ultrasound System
fields.contact_person_1: Reuben Hamilton, Manager Supplier Engagement, Sustainablity & Social Response
fields.facility_diversity_comments: We Are Unable To Provide State-Specific Data Because There Were No Capital Expenditures Lower Than OR IN Excess Of $350,000 For The Erection, Building, Alteration, Reconstruction, Modernization, Improvement, Extension, OR Demolition Of OR By Our Hospital. When Projects Come Up For Erection, Building, Alteration, Reconstruction, Modernization, Improvement, Extension, OR Demolition Of OR By Our Hospital We Will Take Step To Identify State-Specific Diverse Suppliers (mbe's OR Wbe'S) IN Our Supplier Registration System, And Work With The State Of Illinois Department Of Central Management Services Bep (business Enterprise Program) Division, As Well As Other Local Mbe & Wbe Advocacy Groups Such As The Chicago Msdc And Chicago Wbdc To Identify Suppliers.
fields.planned_diversity_expenditures: We Look To Drive Inclusion For Diverse Suppliers IN All Parts Of Our Operations From A Tier I & Tier II Prospective. This Would Include But Not Limited To (construction, Electrical, General Contractor, Professional Staffing, Landscaping, Legal, Information Technology, Consulting, Accounting, Health Care, Transportation, Care Giver, Medical Supply/Ppe, Etc.)
fields.plan_for_diversity_recruitment: We Have Established A Supplier Diversity Portal On Our Corporate Supply Chain Website That Will Allow Suppliers To Register Themselves For Consideration For Upcoming Opportunities. We Will Work With The Soi, Cms, & Bep Divisions As Well As Other Local Community Based Organizations & Advocacy Groups To Promote Upcoming Opportunities And Have Webinars And/OR Live Sessions On How To Do Business With Ssm Health. IN 2024 We Are Re-Focusing Our Efforts To Engage With Diverse Supplier That Are IN The Communities We Serve As Part Of Our Anchor Action Network Community Health Initiatve. The Link To Our Registration Site Is (ssm Health (suppliergateway.com).
fields.challenges_to_diversity_recruitment: Challenges We Have Encountered Have Been Related To The Impact That Covid-19 Has Has On Our Operation And The Communities We Serve. Other Challenges Have To Do With Suppliers Having The Capacity And Capability To Be Able To Provide Services. Another Challenge Has To Do With The Number Of Available Suppliers To Select From, And The Suppliers Having The Operational Capital Needed For Their Business Operation.
fields.hsfrb_assistance: The Ihf & Srb Could Assist Us With Helping To Provide Operational Funding/Capital To Local Suppliers To Enable Them, Either Through State Funded Programs OR Governmental Funded Programs, Work With Us To Create Opportunity Fairs IN Conjunction With Other Corporations And Local Advocacy Groups. Offering Training Course To Suppliers On Working With Large Companies And/OR Stabilizing Their Business Operations.
fields.certifications: Ssm Health Recognize The Following Types Of Certifications: Mbe; Wbe; Vbe; Sdvbe; Hubzone; Hbcu; Ed-Wosb; 8(a); Pwd; Sdb; Dbe; Wosb; Anc/Indian Tribes; Acdbe
fields.point_of_contact: A Supplier Interested IN Doing Business With Ssm Health Can Go Onto Our Corporate Supply Chain Website, Select The Supplier Diversity Link To Learn More About Our Process And Get Registered. The Supplier Can Also Email Us At Supplierdiversity@ssmhealth.com OR Contact: Reuben Hamilton Jr, Manager Supplier Engagement/Sustainability And Social Responsibility, Ssm Health - Saint Louis, 12800 Corporate Hill Dr, St. Louis, MO 63131
fields.enrollment_process: A Supplier Can Enroll To Do Business With Ssm Health By Going To Our Corporate Supply Chain Website, Select The Supplier Diversity Link To Learn More About Our Process And Get Registered. Here Is A Link To Our Registration Portal (ssm Health (suppliergateway.com).
fields.examples_of_successes: Some Successful Recruitment Activities Will Include Conducting Webinars, Having Community Vendor Fairs, Working With Local Community Based Organizations And Diverse Supplier Advocacy Groups, Working With Governmental Agencies And Having IN House Vendor Fairs.
fields.full_address: 1 Good Samaritan Way, Mt. Vernon, IL 62864
